name: Shelves, or: an Incomplete list of things which make this room a Home
name_original: Shelves, or: an Incomplete list of things which make this room a Home
description:
Thank you for visiting this little museum! You're the first human here in nearly a century! Welcome, Welcome! Come on in!

~~

I might go back through and parse down some of my writing, I'm sure it could use a couple more passes.
Inspired in part by Freya C's Recursive Islands, (which you've probably seen if you've checked out this jam)
and is also a riff on my previous game, Artifacts (Found) in a Lonely Room.

I blatantly copied the work of /eatingkiwiskin from the first room of their game The Museum because it was pretty.

I still feel proud of myself for writing "art-ifacts" on the wall.
